title: Things at HDFC weren't going according to plan post merger, says MD & CEO Sashidhar Jagdishan
description: Jagdishan acknowledged that the banking landscape changed dramatically after the lender decided to merge with parent HDFC in April 2022, but he defended the decision.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
